issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

fields.summary: EMI registered by user from nonnative region fails to register

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

When a user bundle, uploads and registers an image using the same {{-n/--name}} option, image registration is successful in the first region, but will fail in the rest with the following error:
{code}
euca-install-image: error (InvalidAMIName.Duplicate): AMI name ubuntu-wily-x86_64 is already in use by EMI emi-0c3ecb16
{code}

*Steps*

# Set up federated cloud (i.e. multiple regions) - see EUCA-10442
# Create account under one region
{code}
# euare-accountcreate -a test1
test1	002093902049
{code}
# Download credentials for admin user for test account
{code}
# euca-get-credentials -a test1 -u admin test1-admin.zip
# unzip test1-admin.zip
Archive:  test1-admin.zip
To setup the environment run: source /path/to/eucarc
  inflating: eucarc
  inflating: iamrc
  inflating: cloud-cert.pem
  inflating: jssecacerts
  inflating: euca2-admin-af5f63d3-pk.pem
  inflating: euca2-admin-af5f63d3-cert.pem
{code}
# Source eucarc; confirm multiple regions display
{code}
# source eucarc
# euca-describe-regions
REGION	region-1	http://compute.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	region-2	http://compute.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}
# Download Ubuntu cloud image; convert to raw image
{code}
# wget http://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/wily/current/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img
# qemu-img convert -O raw wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw
{code}
# Bundle, upload and register EMI in native region (due to EUCA-10980 bug)
{code}
# euca-install-image -b ubuntu-wily-amd64 -i wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw -n ubuntu-wily-x86_64 -r x86_64 -U http://objectstorage.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --virtualization-type hvm --cert test1-admin/euca2-admin-af5f63d3-cert.pem --privatekey test1-admin/euca2-admin-af5f63d3-pk.pem --ec2cert test1-admin/cloud-cert.pem

euca-install-image: error (InvalidAMIName.Duplicate): AMI name ubuntu-wily-x86_64 is already in use by EMI emi-0c3ecb16
{code}

*Additional Notes*

* Since RegisterImage is an EC2 action, [resources are regionally scoped|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/resources.html].
* Sosreports from key components can be found in EUCA-10980
fields.summary: EMI registered using the same name across regions fails

comments.body: I would expect that the register action is being performed against the same region for both images.
[~hspencer], would you re-test either with both URL specified on command line or with different 'eucarc' files sourced before each import? Thanks!

euca-install-image uses two services, so if you intend to supply service URLs at the command line you typically need to supply _both_ of them.  From the looks of it, when you ran it for the second time you overrode the service URL for the S3 service, but not the EC2 service, so it used the URL in the environment -- the one for the region you already registered an image in.

Issue here is that euca-install-image used the EC2_URL sourced from the eucarc - which was a different region than the {{-U}} option used.  euca-install-image has an {{--ec2-url}} option which mitigates this issue.  
{code}
# euca-install-image -b ubuntu-wily-amd64 -i wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw -n ubuntu-wily-x86_64 -r x86_64 -U http://objectstorage.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --ec2-url http://compute.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --virtualization-type hvm --cert test1-admin/euca2-admin-af5f63d3-cert.pem --privatekey test1-admin/euca2-admin-af5f63d3-pk.pem --ec2cert test1-admin/cloud-cert.pem
